abstract: In its effort to unload debt related to Kohlberg Kravis Roberts‘s buyout of First Data Group, Citigroup is reportedly looking for help from an unusual source: vulture investors.
lead_paragraph: In its effort to unload debt related to Kohlberg Kravis Roberts‘s buyout of First Data Group, Citigroup is reportedly looking for help from an unusual source: vulture investors.

headline.main: Citigroup Tries to Lure Vultures to First Data Debt, Report Says
